name: Mission: Minis Hair Bestsellers Set
about: What it is:A set featuring mini-but-mighty sizes of The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer, Perk Up Dry Shampoo, and Soulfood Nourishing Mask..Hair Texture:Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily.Hair Type:Fine, Medium, and Thick.Hair Concerns:- Dryness.Key Benefits:- Protects against heat damage up to 450u00b0F.Highlighted Ingredients:- Natural Rice Starch: Absorbs dirt and oil while adding volume and texture..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, cruelty-free, and come in recyclable packaging..What Else You Need to Know:Embark on a mission for mighty minis. This limited-edition gift set is filled with bestsellers to nourish, detangle, and refresh hair for a travel-sized taste of everyoneu2019s favorite formulas. Featuring a mini The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer, Perk Up Dry Shampoo, and Soulfood Nourishing Mask, this gift is sure to pleaseu2014even the friend who has everything..Fragrance Description:A blend of warm vanilla, spicy sweet clover, and fresh citrus...This Set Contains:- 1 oz/ 30 mL The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer (mini).Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Natural Rice Starch: Absorbs dirt and oil while adding volume and texture. .-Jojoba Seed oil: Contains powerful antioxidants and is rich in vitamins A, D, and E. .-Sea Buckthorn: Rich in fatty acid omega 7, making it the holy grail for all things hair. ..Soulfood Nourishing Mask:.Water/Eau/Aqua, Cetearyl Alcohol, Cetyl Alcohol, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Behentrimonium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Dimethicone, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Cetrimonium Chloride, Panthenol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aminomethyl Propanol, Phenoxyethanol, Isopropyl Alcohol, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene...The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer:.Isododecane, Isopropyl Palmitate, Isohexadecane, Ethylhexyl Olivate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Persea Gratissima (Avocado/Avocat) Oil, Squalane, Tocopheryl Acetate, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Limonene, Citronellol, Coumarin, Geraniol...Perk Up Dry Shampoo:.Hydrofluorocarbon 152a, Butane, Alcohol Denat. (SD Alcohol 40-B), Oryza Sativa (Rice/Riz) Starch, Isobutane, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Diisopropyl Adipate, Hippophae Rhamnoides (Sea Buckthorn/Argousier) Fruit/Seed Oil, Fragrance/Parfum, Benzyl Benzoate, Hydroxycitronellal, Citronellol, Limonene...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Soulfood Nourishing Mask:.-Massage through wet hair. .-Let penetrate for five to seven minutes..-Rinse well. .-Use weekly or daily...The Wizard Silicone-Free Detangling Primer:.-Evenly mist throughout damp hair before detangling or blow drying. .-If youu2019re letting hair air dry, mist throughout damp hair then style as usual...Perk Up Dry Shampoo:.-Shake well. .-Spray eight inches away from roots. .-Massage into scalp as you would with wet shampoo. .-Brush through as needed... Recycling Instructions:.-TerraCycle and amika joined forces to create a free national recycling program for amikau2019s hair care packaging..-Save your empties, print a free shipping label, and send back your packaging to give it a new life. Learn more and sign up at terracycle.com/en-US/brigades/amika.

reviews.review_title: Really good set but idk if itu2019s worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used all of these products and I think the hair mask is the best one out of all of them it made my hair super smooth and soft, the dry shampoo didnu2019t really work on me and it had this really weird smell but overall itu2019s pretty good.
